description: If it has some option to continue support current patchbay connections after closing, it would be great. Also if it could be minimized to taskbar and provide easy way to switch profiles, it would save a lot of time.
summary: Easy to use, needs more features

description: Sadly, this flatpak does not come with the wine bridges that allow use of windows VSTs! That's all I wanted this for. I'm sure they can be installed manually, but I am a Linux novice. I'm leaving a fair(?) rating because have no clue if this is the fault of the developer(s) or if this is a limitation of flatpaks. The program is probably great, so give it a spin if you don't need it for my use case!
Works in Ardour with win vsts (ubuntu 20.04 ) great!
fkees m ng,vjcyvvbkbnkkjl bvj ckxn kk  xnc
It opens and install but at the time to work and make music the program don´t expose the midi channels to the host, in this case, ardour, also can´t be added as a plugin.
